item.title: Algorithm Practice 2 - Singly Linked List
item.description: Question is here My Study Note: I didn’t solve this problem at the first try, actually, I didn’t understand this problem at all because I was still confused about the data structuresingly linked list. The approach I learned from this original solution var mergeTwoLists = function(l1, l2) { let list = {value: null, next: null}; temp = list; while(l1 && l2){ if(l1.val< l2.val){ temp.next = l1 l1= l1.next } else{ temp.
